thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 21 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Sichuan Huiyuan Optical's Shareholder And Partner Plan Tender Offer To Buy Co's Stake

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sichuan Huiyuan Optical's Shareholder And Partner Plan Tender Offer To Buy Co's Stake

organizations.name: reuters) - sichuan huiyuan optical communications co ltd

text:
Feb 22 (Reuters) - Sichuan Huiyuan Optical Communications Co Ltd:
* SAYS SECOND BIGGEST SHAREHOLDER AND PARTNER PLAN TENDER OFFER TO BUY AT LEAST 15 PERCENT STAKE IN THE COMPANY BY CASH WITH OFFER PRICE OF UP TO 21.5 YUAN ($3.39) PER SHARE Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2ELbHYM Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3468 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
